attributes.title: Conscious Resources Are More Useful And Powerful For Your Life
attributes.description:
5 FEBRUARY 2020 (8:40 AM IST, WEDNESDAY)

*POWERFUL COGNITIONS FROM TODAY’S NITHYANANDA (ENGLISH) SATSANG

*TODAY, IS ONE OF THE GREATEST HAPPENING IN THE HISTORY OF HINDUISM FOR HINDUS ALL OVER THE WORLD: THE KUMBHABHISHEKAM OF THE TANJORE BRIHADEESHWARA TEMPLE, THANJAI PERUVUDAYAR! THIS IS THE LARGEST GRANITE TEMPLE WHICH IS STILL ALIVE AND WORSHIPPED TRADITIONALLY. WE WILL PRESENT THE KUMBHABHISHEKAM LIVE TO YOU TODAY DURING THE SATSANG!

*PARAMASHIVA’S MESSAGE DIRECTLY FROM SHRIKAILASA:

*UNDERSTANDING THE REALITY OF PARAMASHIVA NOT ONLY BECOMES ENLIGHTENMENT, IT FILLS YOUR BONE MARROW, EVERY ORGAN AND EVERY STATE OF CONSCIOUSNESS.

*IF YOU UNDERSTAND PARAMASHIVA’S REALITY AND THE WAY HE EXISTS, YOUR INTERNAL ORGANS WILL START FUNCTIONING WITH SO MUCH OF ENERGY.

*UNDERSTANDING THE REALITY OF PARAMASHIVA AND THAT UNDERSTANDING MAKING YOUR BODY, MIND, CONSCIOUSNESS AND EMOTION RADIATE HIS EXISTENCE IS NOT THE NEW AGE GURUS’ MEDITATION TECHNIQUE FOR STRESS-FREE LIVING. THOSE MEDITATION TECHNIQUES ARE DIFFERENT AND WHAT I AM TALKING IS DIFFERENT. I AM NOT SAYING, ‘DON’T DO MEDITATION FOR STRESS-FREE LIVING’. I AM ONLY SAYING, ‘DON’T COMPARE PARAMASHIVA JNANA WITH THAT.’ IF YOU UNDERSTAND THE PARAMASHIVA JNANA OF PARAMASHIVA, YOU WILL BECOME STRESS-FREE. BUT DON’T THINK THE REALITY OF PARAMASHIVA SHOULD BE UNDERSTOOD JUST TO BECOME STRESS-FREE. WHEN YOU UNDERSTAND HIS REALITY YOU WILL HAVE SO MUCH OF CELEBRATION! YOU WILL UNDERSTAND: ‘WHAT A COMPASSIONATE BEING HE IS! HE HAS GIVEN HIMSELF IN ALL HIS GLORY IN MY CONSCIOUSNESS!’

*IF A POOR VILLAGE GIRL IS MARRIED TO A RICH ROYAL FAMILY AND BECOMES QUEEN, SHE WILL NEVER BOTHER ABOUT THE SMALL ISSUES LIKE SHE HAS TO GET UP EARLY MORNING AND GO TO THE TEMPLE FOR WORSHIP, BECAUSE SHE KNOWS WHAT THIS LIFE HAS ADDED TO HER.

*IN ALL HINDU KINGDOMS, THE ROYAL FAMILY HAS TO ATTEND THE MORNING WORSHIP WHICH IS ALWAYS IN BRAHMA MUHURTHAM - 4:30 TO 6 AM. IT INCLUDES THE PRANAYAMA AND BHOOTHA SHUDDHI ALSO, MEANING THE RIGHT PROCESSES FOR PURIFYING THE SPACE INSIDE THE BEING.

*I HAVE PERSONALLY SEEN TRIVANDRUM MAHARAJAH DOING THAT WORSHIP EVERYDAY. I WILL CALL HIM MORE A SAINT THAN A KING. HE IS ONE OF THE MOST SINCERE, HUMBLE DEVOTED BEINGS I HAVE SEEN. SUCH DEVOTION TO PADMANABHA SWAMY! AND SO MUCH RESPECT HE HAD. HE WILL NOT EVEN SIT ON AN EQUAL SEAT WITH ME!

*I WAS TAKEN TO THE TANJORE TEMPLE WHEN I WAS A CHILD. I ASKED MY ELDERS, ‘ARE THERE PEOPLE TO BUILD TEMPLES LIKE THIS IN THE MODERN DAY?’ MY GRANDFATHER LAUGHED AND SAID, ‘EVEN TO MAINTAIN THEM, WE DON'T HAVE PEOPLE!’ HE ASKED ME IN A JOVIAL WAY, ‘WHY ARE YOU ASKING? ARE YOU GOING TO BUILD?’ I SAID, ‘LET US TELL OUR SANNIDHANAM, THE 230TH PONTIFF OF THONDAI MANDALAM AADHEENAM TO BUILD A TEMPLE LIKE THIS FOR OUR MUTT!’ HE JUST SMILED AND KEPT QUIET. THE 230TH PONTIFF WAS ALIVE AT THAT TIME AND HE WAS WAITING FOR ME TO BECOME 18 TO BECOME HIS SUCCESSOR SO THAT HE CAN HANDOVER HIS RESPONSIBILITY TO ME, ATTAIN JEEVA SAMADHI AND GO BACK TO KAILASA! HE WAS A GREAT YOGI WHO HAD MASTERED THE YOGIC SCIENCES. MY GRANDFATHER WENT AND TOLD THE SANNIDHANAM, ‘THIS FELLOW WAS ASKING LIKE THIS AND HE WANTS TO TELL YOU AND BUILD A TEMPLE LIKE THE TANJORE TEMPLE FOR OUR MUTT.’ THE SANNIDHANAM STARTED HAVING BLISS TEARS AND SAID, ‘HE WILL BUILD, BUT WE SHOULD BE THERE TO SEE NO?!’ MEANING, ‘WILL WE BE THERE ALIVE TILL THAT TIME?’

*EVEN THE 291ST PONTIFF OF THE MADURAI AADHEENAM WAS A GREAT YOGI! HIS AMAZING KNOWLEDGE AND INTELLIGENCE ON THE HIGHER TIME AND SPACE ZONES, I WILL PRESENT ONE DAY.

*I WAS ALSO TAKEN TO THE GURUVAYUR AND PADMANABHASWAMY TEMPLES. I SAW THE WAY THE GURUVAYUR TEMPLE WAS RUNNING. THEY HAD STRICT RULES LIKE YOU CAN ENTER ONLY WITH DHOTI. THEY USED TO DO THE SRIDEVI UTSAV IN THE NIGHT WITH MAYBE 100,000 LAMPS! AND I SAW THE WAY THE PADMANABHA SWAMI TEMPLE WAS MAINTAINED AND RUNNING WITH SUCH VIBRANT SANCTITY!

*WHEN THE TRIVANDRUM MAHARAJAH INVITED ME AND I WENT AND STAYED IN THE MAHARAJAH’S PALACE, I UNDERSTOOD THE AMOUNT OF TIME AND DEDICATION IT TAKES TO RUN THE PADMANABHASWAMY TEMPLE.

*SO WHEN I EXPERIENCED PARAMASHIVA, I FELT LIKE THE POOR VILLAGE GIRL WHO GOT MARRIED AND BECAME QUEEN! IT WAS ABSOLUTE TRANSFORMATION. THE RESOURCES AT MY DISPOSAL IN THE FIELD OF CONSCIOUSNESS MULTIPLIED BILLION TIMES. AND THESE RESOURCES ARE MORE VALUABLE THAN ANY RESOURCE IN THE EXTERNAL WORLD.
